terminal.hello: Hello! Type 'help' to see available commands.
terminal.help: Available commands: about, projects, skills, contact, theme, language, clear
terminal.notFound: Command not found. Type 'help' for available commands.
terminal.commands:
Available commands:
- about: Display information about me
- projects: Show my projects
- skills: List my technical skills
- contact: Display contact information
- theme: Toggle terminal theme (green/amber)
- language: Switch language (en/fr)
- clear: Clear terminal history
- easteregg: Discover hidden features

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Welcome to my terminal portfolio! I'm a passionate developer with experience in building web applications using modern technologies.
about.background: With a background in computer science and several years of industry experience, I specialize in creating efficient and elegant solutions to complex problems.
about.approach: I believe in clean code, continuous learning, and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices.

project1.title: Project One
project1.description: A responsive web application built with React and Node.js.

project2.title: Project Two
project2.description: An e-commerce platform with secure payment processing.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.message: Feel free to reach out through any of these channels!

snake.instructions: Use arrow keys to control the snake. Eat the food to grow!
